Review: Joe has been my barber for years, definitely my go-to when I'm looking for a fresh cut. It's a one man show at The End Result, quick, quality service. Definitely would recommend setting your next hair cut appointment  up with joe. #supportsmallbusinesses

Joe is really good at what he does and is very easy to get along with. He has a ton of clients, and since he is a one man shop, can only take clients by appointments, so just give him a call. Would highly recommend him! Shop definitely has an old vintage charm about it. My parents have lived in the area for 30+ years and still remember the barber shop being there in the late 70s.

Joe Rieder. Great guy. Great barber. Great conversationalist. This is an APPOINTMENT ONLY shop. It's not because he's a dick or a snob, it's so the customer gets the best experience possible. So call. Set it up. If not, Supercuts is ready to hack your head. He's on time.  You better be as well.
Joe has been cutting my hair for years.  Always a great cut!   You won't regret going to Joe he does a phenomenal job.

So my husbands dad went to this place for years getting his hair cut my how's dad and then joe starting cutting hair and my husband got his hair done by joe. I just think that's really neat.Not to mention my husband can walk to his place. And I must say he always looks good after leaving! Joe is a great guy and can get super busy so get those appointments in! Thankfully we have never had a problem:) It's great to be able to support a local business

This guy is rude. I was standing in the door asking my 2 year old if he wanted a hair cut here and the guy sitting in the chair doing absolutely nothing tells me he won't cut his hair because he only takes appointments. Seriously your doing nothing. His hair takes 5 mind and you just let a customer walk away and lost money.. I will be sure to tell lots of people how rude this place is..

I have been a neighbor and client of Joe since the early 80's. He gets you in and out and gives a great cut. Always good to chat with and always leave with a good hair cut and a good laugh with Joe. Thanks always Joe!!!
I have been coming here for a few years now! Joe is always quick to accomadate and does a great job!
Been coming here since I moved here from Long Beach.  Very Laid Back, Joe is an awesome guy, and does a great job.  Call and make an appt though.

I went to the End Result today and am so happy with my cut and color.... I absolutely LOVE It. Driving by, I wouldn't have known it was there and its not the typical place you'd find a salon. I had my hair done by Stephanie and am so excited to have such a great new stylist!
